pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tabular data as published on the web is often not well formattedand structured. Messytables tries to detect and fix errors in thedata. Typical examples include:* Finding the header of a table when there are explanations and text fragments in the first few rows of the table.* Guessing the type of columns in CSV data.This library provides data structures and some heuristics tofix these problems and read a wide number of different tabularabominations.See the full documentation at: https://messytables.readthedocs.io
